subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Mughal emperor is associated with the construction of the Mehrangarh Fort in Jodhpur?
question_hi: जोधपुर में निर्माण किया गया मुगल उम्मेदवार कौन सी शहरों में निर्माण किया गया था?
explanation_en: Aurangzeb is considered to be the emperor who constructed the Mehrangarh Fort in Jodhpur. It was built during his reign in the 16th century.
explanation_hi: अरोंगजेब को पुलिस को भागीय होंगजेब ने मेहरांगर बिहर को भागीय होंगजेब ने बना विभिजाने वाले मेहरांगर बिहर
explanation_en: Aurangzeb is credited with the construction of Mehrangarh Fort in Jodhpur. It was built during his reign in the 16th century.
explanation_hi: अरोंगजेब ने क्लीस बिहींगर बिहर को बना विभिजाने वाले मेहरांगर बिहर
अरोंगजेब ने क्लीस बिहींगर बिहर को बना विभिजाने वाले मेहरांगर बिहर

explanation_hi.subject: Rajasthan History
explanation_hi.question_en: Which emperor is associated with the construction of Chittorgarh Fort?
explanation_hi.question_hi: जितारगार को कौर्तेल कांतुर मेहरांगर बिहर
explanation_hi.explanation_en: King Sanga is associated with the construction of Chittor Fort. Chittorgarh Fort is named after him.
